sections.number: 81.01.010 - Adoption of provisions of chapter 80.01 RCW.
sections.text:
RCW 81.01.010

Adoption of provisions of chapter 80.01 RCW.

The provisions of chapter 80.01 RCW, as now or hereafter amended, apply to Title 81 RCW as fully as though they were set forth herein.

The provisions of chapter 80.01 RCW, as now or hereafter amended, apply to Title 81 RCW as fully as though they were set forth herein.

[ 1961 c 14 s 81.01.010.]
